definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: The places you have visited are marked in bright purple on the map of the world .
sentences.chinese: 你去過的地方將會在世界地圖上用亮紫色標出來。

sentences.english: Jing stands in front of a world map with three other Chinese TV personalities.
sentences.chinese: 敬一丹和另外三個電視人物站在世界地圖前。

sentences.english: On the world map, scroll to zoom in and out.
sentences.chinese: 在世界地圖畫面中可縮放地圖。

sentences.english: This function can be painted by controlling the latitude and longitude of different areas of the world map.
sentences.chinese: 這個函數可以通過控制經緯度畫不同範圍的世界地圖。

sentences.english: Pulling up a long tube, she unrolled a map of the world.
sentences.chinese: 她抽出一個長卷筒，打開了一張世界地圖。

sentences.english: Every time you pass a level, you will see a world map.
sentences.chinese: 每次你過一關，你將看見一張世界地圖。

sentences.english: He made a globe and, according to Diogenes Laertes was the first to draw a map of the inhabited world.
sentences.chinese: 他是第一個繪製了有人居住的世界地圖。

sentences.english: I bought a map of the world as well as some picture books.
sentences.chinese: 我買了一張世界地圖還有一些小人書。

sentences.english: For three millennia, man has tried to map his world exactly.
sentences.chinese: 三千年來，人們一直嘗試着精確地繪製世界地圖。

sentences.english: Looking ahead, like the whole seabed is a three-dimensional map of the world.
sentences.chinese: 放眼望去，整個海底活像是一幅立體的世界地圖。

sentences.english: Mr. Taylor put a miniature map of the World on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒先生在牆上掛上了一幅世界地圖的縮圖。

definition: lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
